spec: update the test.sh script (and any scripts it calls as neccessry) such that we pipe all stderr and stdout to a new file in the root "last_test_run.log" iff --log is passed as a param
commitMessage:
Added --log parameter support to test.sh script

- Added ability to redirect all test output to last_test_run.log when --log is passed
- Refactored test.sh to use a function for better code organization
- Maintained existing functionality when --log is not passed
